From: Olga Vovk <ovovk@samvit-solutions.com>
Dear all,
What would be the best way to capture the information about the site at which a specimen used for research was processed.
It is a biorepository.
Should I use the Organization resource?

Olga Vovk
<:3)))~~~~
Procedure allows capturing both performer (which would let you capture the organization responsible) as well as Location (which would be the specific physical site).
